original_title: Kushani Rohanadeera is new Secretary General of Parliament
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe yesterday appointed Kushani Rohanadeera as the new Secretary General of Parliament with effect from May 23, 2023.
Ms. Rohanadeera held the post of Deputy Secretary General and was also the Chief of Staff of Parliament.
Dhammika Dasanayake who held the post earlier, retired last week creating the vacancy. (Yohan Perera)
